title: Indian top IT firms set for another tepid quarter on weak US demand, client spending
full_text: Indian top IT firms set for another tepid quarter on weak US demand, client spending. India's information technology firms are expected to report another muted quarter, as tepid demand in the U.S. and holiday-period client shutdowns continue.... By Bharath Rajeswaran and Sai Ishwarbharath B Jan 8 (Reuters) - India's information technology firms are expected to report another muted quarter, as tepid demand in the U.S. and holiday-period clie… [+3129 chars]
